questions_1.question: Which of the following are the effects of N2 input?
Options: Transmittes rotational movement to the flyweights in the MFC governing system.
Provides the N2 signal to the N2 servo governor.
Provides N2 signal to the accel/decel computer system
Provides N2 to the maximum corrected speed limiting system.
questions_1.correctFeedback:
That's Correct!

You have chosen the correct option.
questions_1.InCorrectFeedback:
That's Incorrect!

You have chosen the wrong option. The valid answer is "Transmittes rotational movement to the flyweights in the MFC governing system, Provides the N2 signal to the N2 servo governor, Provides N2 signal to the accel/decel computer system, Provides N2 to the maximum corrected speed limiting system."
questions_1.partialFeedback:
